captions.text: Mm-hmm. It's so ridiculous.

- Do you love Drew ?
- [ Drew On Telephone, Indistinct ]

[ Drew ] No, don't do anything.
Just stay exactly where--

- Do you love Drew ?
- He's not gonna get
a better offer than that.

- You mean, like you loved Mom ?
- Forget about me and Mom.

- Are you gonna marry him ?
- [ Drew ] Oh, come on.
l'm probably.

Listen, l'm crazy about the guy.
He's smart. He's aggressive.

He could carry
Parrish Communications into
the 21st century and me along with it.
Mm-hmm. So, what's wrong with that ?

That's for me.
l'm talking about you.

lt's not what you say about Drew.
It's what you don't say.
Maybe you're not listening.
Oh, yes, l am.

[ Drew ]
Give him whatever he wants.

There's not an ounce of excitement,
not a... whisper of a thrill.

And this relationship has
all the passion of a pair of titmice.

l want you to get
swept away out there.

l want you to levitate.
l want you to...

sing with rapture
and dance like a dervish.

- Oh, that's all.
- Yeah. Be deliriously happy,

or at least
Ieave yourself open to be.

Okay.
[ Sighs ]

''Be deliriously happy.''
l shall, uh--
l shall do my utmost.
[ Chuckling ]
l know it's a cornball thing.
But love is passion,
obsession,
someone you can't live without.
l say, fall head over heels.

Find someone you can love like crazy
and who will love you the same way back.

How do you find him ? Well, you forget
your head, and you listen to your heart.
And l'm not hearing any heart.

'Cause the truth is, honey, there's
no sense living your life without this.

To make the iourney
and not fall deeply in love,

well, you haven't lived
a life at all.

But you have to try, 'cause
if you haven't tried, you haven't lived.
Bravo !
Oh, you're tough.
[ Sighs ]
l'm sorry. Okay.

Give it to me again,
but the short version this time.
Okay. Stay open.

Who knows ?
Lightning could strike.

- [ Chuckling ]
- Yeah ?
Yeah.

What do you think ?
Is it just the executive committee,

title: Meet Joe Black (1/10) Movie CLIP - Lightning Could Strike (1998) HD

comments.text:
Love...

I want You to get swept away out there.
I want You to levitate.
I want You to sing with rapture and dance like a dervish.

LOVE is passion, obsession, someone you can't live without.
I say, fall head over heels.
Find somebody you love like crazy and who will love you the same way back...

Meet Joe Black﻿

This is my favourite film. Anthony Hopkins and Claire Forlani are simply 
wonderful. Why Leonard Maltin gives it only two stars is a mystery to me. 
My only quibble - perhaps the film should've ended with Hopkins and Pitt 
walking up the steps and out of sight, and left it at that? In any event, 
it is a marvellous movie.
